entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 11 April 2023
